name: Slash Sequence
description:
Run to the end of this dangerous street with nothing but your sword! 
Slow down time to slash enemies, but make sure they're weak enough first...
Taking damage can be healed by slashing up enemies into tiny bits!
Get to the end with the best time possible!

Est play time: ~5-10 minutes

CONTROLS   (Uses controller only)

Normal
X/LB        - Attack
Y           - Slide
Hold RT     - Enter Slash Sequence
Left Stick  - Move

In Slash Sequence
X/LB        - Slash
Left Stick  - Rotate Slash Plane
Right Stick - Move Camera
